headline.main: Highlanders Repel Force to Edge Closer to Playoffs
headline.print_headline: Highlanders Repel Force to Edge Closer to Playoffs

docs.snippet: The Otago Highlanders moved closer to another season of Super Rugby playoff action after overcoming stubborn basement dwellers the Western Force 23-3 in an error-strewn clash in Perth on Saturday....
docs.lead_paragraph: The Otago Highlanders moved closer to another season of Super Rugby playoff action after overcoming stubborn basement dwellers the Western Force 23-3 in an error-strewn clash in Perth on Saturday.

headline.main: Saudi Clerics Urge Calm as Village Hit by Islamic State Seethes
headline.print_headline: Saudi Clerics Urge Calm as Village Hit by Islamic State Seethes

docs.snippet: Saudi Arabia's top Sunni cleric on Saturday branded a deadly attack on Shi'ite Muslims a bid to sow chaos, after villagers targeted in the bombing vented their anger at what they saw as the Sunni-dominated government's indifference to their safety...
docs.lead_paragraph: Saudi Arabia's top Sunni cleric on Saturday branded a deadly attack on Shi'ite Muslims a bid to sow chaos, after villagers targeted in the bombing vented their anger at what they saw as the Sunni-dominated government's indifference to their safety.

headline.main: What Will Get Europe's Economy Rolling Again?
headline.print_headline: What Will Get Europe's Economy Rolling Again?

docs.snippet: What's behind Europe's sluggish recovery and high jobless rate? What can central banks and governments do to get things going?...
docs.lead_paragraph: What's behind Europe's sluggish recovery and high jobless rate? What can central banks and governments do to get things going?

headline.main: Senate blocks bill to extend 'Patriot Act' provisions
headline.sub: Senate blocks bill to extend 'Patriot Act' provisions

docs.snippet: A bill to end spy agencies' bulk collection of Americans' telephone records was blocked by the Senate, leaving the fate of the program uncertain. Rough Cut (no reporter narration)....
docs.lead_paragraph: A bill to end spy agencies' bulk collection of Americans' telephone records was blocked by the Senate, leaving the fate of the program uncertain. Rough Cut (no reporter narration).

headline.main: UN Envoy: IS Poised to Become 'Serious Threat' in Libya
headline.print_headline: UN Envoy: IS Poised to Become 'Serious Threat' in Libya

docs.snippet: The United Nations envoy on Libya says that Islamic State extremists can "become a very serious threat" in the country within months if rival governments fail to reach a unity deal....
docs.lead_paragraph: The United Nations envoy on Libya says that Islamic State extremists can "become a very serious threat" in the country within months if rival governments fail to reach a unity deal.

headline.main: Vermont Town's Famous Floating Bridge Reopens With Fanfare
headline.print_headline: Vermont Town's Famous Floating Bridge Reopens With Fanfare

docs.snippet: A tiny Vermont town's famous wooden floating bridge that's believed to be the only one of its kind in the country has been rebuilt and is reopening this weekend....
docs.lead_paragraph: A tiny Vermont town's famous wooden floating bridge that's believed to be the only one of its kind in the country has been rebuilt and is reopening this weekend.

headline.main: Thousands Attend Italian Nun's Beatification in Kenya
headline.print_headline: Thousands Attend Italian Nun's Beatification in Kenya

docs.snippet: Tens of thousands of people have gathered in Nyeri in central Kenya to attend the beatification ceremony of an Italian nun who worked for many years in the East African nation....
docs.lead_paragraph: Tens of thousands of people have gathered in Nyeri in central Kenya to attend the beatification ceremony of an Italian nun who worked for many years in the East African nation.

headline.main: UN urges support for 15 million displaced by Syria and Iraq conflicts
headline.sub: UN urges support for 15 million displaced by Syria and Iraq conflicts

docs.snippet: The United Nations High Commissioner for Refugees says other countries must share the pressure Lebanon and Jordan are facing due to displacement of people from Iraq and Syria. Nathan Frandino reports....
docs.lead_paragraph: The United Nations High Commissioner for Refugees says other countries must share the pressure Lebanon and Jordan are facing due to displacement of people from Iraq and Syria. Nathan Frandino reports.

headline.main: 6 Missing After Fire at Guesthouse in Southern Germany
headline.print_headline: 6 Missing After Fire at Guesthouse in Southern Germany

docs.snippet: Six people are missing and feared dead after a fire at a guesthouse in southern Germany, police said Saturday....
docs.lead_paragraph: Six people are missing and feared dead after a fire at a guesthouse in southern Germany, police said Saturday.

headline.main: Congo Electoral Commission Updates Voter List
headline.print_headline: Congo Electoral Commission Updates Voter List

docs.snippet: Congo's national electoral commission says it has updated the country's electoral list to reassure voters ahead of local and provincial elections this year....
docs.lead_paragraph: Congo's national electoral commission says it has updated the country's electoral list to reassure voters ahead of local and provincial elections this year.
